|flash1type = SPI NOR |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR2 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->

|availability = Discontinued |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7612EN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== ALFA Network AC1200RM is an AC1200 router, :with 5-port FE switch and USB 2.0 port. Device is based on [[MediaTek]] MT7620A + MT7612EN. * CPU: MT7620A (580MHz) WiSoC * 16MB of FLASH (SPI NOR) * 64MB of RAM (DDR2) * 2T2R 2.4GHz (MT7620A) * 2T2R 5GHz (MT7612EN) * 5x 10/100Mbps Ethernet ports with passive PoE :(output in WAN and LAN4) * 1x USB 2.0 port * DC jack for main power input (12-24V) * 2x UART, I2C, I2S and LED headers * 9x LED (8 driven by GPIO) * 1x button (reset)
==Links of Interest== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/alfa_network/alfa_network_ac1200rm ''ALFA Network AC1200RM'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] :[https://forum.openwrt.org/t/upgrading-alfa-network-ac1200r-from-barrier-breaker-14-07/64255 ''Upgrading ALFA Network AC1200R from BB 14.07''] :[https://git.openwrt.org/?p=openwrt/openwrt.git;a=commit;h=5352669c2c470f2d2bb02deccfa758e1867e07b0 ramips: add support for ALFA Network AC1200RM]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/alfa_network/alfa_network_ac1200rm |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = mt7620 |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = <!-- 23.05.0 --> |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here
